title: MWIC Bonus Episode 3: Autocar meets Citroen CEO Thierry Koskas
description: Autocar's Editor Mark Tisshaw talks to Citroen CEO Thierry Koskas about possible new 2CVs and much more In this bonus podcast, Autocar's Editor, Mark Tisshaw, meets the Citroen CEO Thierry Koskas. Citroen has refreshed its entire model range in the past 12 months as part of an all-new line up, but Koskas now has an eye on the future including making more of its illustrious past.
